it.uniud.mads.jlibbig.core.std

Class WeightedMatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.uniud.mads.jlibbig.core.std.Matcher
      • it.uniud.mads.jlibbig.core.std.WeightedMatcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Matcher<Bigraph,Bigraph>

    public class WeightedMatcher
extends Matcher
    Provides services for computing optimal matches of bigraphs with abstract internal names; matches are described by Match. A weight is assigned to every matchable pair of nodes (one from the agent and the other from the redex) and the weight of a match is defined as the sum of weights assigned to the pairs used in the match. The matcher computes optimal matches only i.e. those with maximal (resp. minimal) weight. The default behaviour looks for maximal solutions but the behaviour can be specified. Weights are defined by the method matchingWeight(it.uniud.mads.jlibbig.core.std.Bigraph, it.uniud.mads.jlibbig.core.std.Node, it.uniud.mads.jlibbig.core.std.Bigraph, it.uniud.mads.jlibbig.core.std.Node). The field DEFAULT refers to a default instance of the matcher. The standard matching of nodes can be changed by re-implementing the protected method Matcher.areMatchable(it.uniud.mads.jlibbig.core.std.Bigraph, it.uniud.mads.jlibbig.core.std.Node, it.uniud.mads.jlibbig.core.std.Bigraph, it.uniud.mads.jlibbig.core.std.Node). WARNING: Implementation still is in an early stage.
